// src/components/daymenu/DayMenu.js import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './DayMenu.css'; const DayMenu = ({ day, meals }) => { console.log('DayMenu meals:', meals); // Добавим логирование данных return (

{day}

Завтрак

{meals.breakfast && meals.breakfast.map((meal) => (

{meal.title}

{meal.description}

))}

Обед

{meals.lunch && meals.lunch.map((meal) => (

{meal.title}

{meal.description}

))}

Ужин

{meals.dinner && meals.dinner.map((meal) => (

{meal.title}

{meal.description}

))}
); }; export default DayMenu;
